text.div:
CodeSelectionMode

The way in which the code is selected

This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/code-selection-mode

CodeDisplayDefinition
codeOnly this code is selected.
childrenOnly the immediate children (codes with a is-a relationship) are selected, but not this code itself.
descendantsAll descendants of this code are selected, but not this code itself.
allThis code and any descendants are selected.
systemAll codes from the specified code system.

name: CodeSelectionMode
description: The way in which the code is selected

concept.definition: Only the immediate children (codes with a is-a relationship) are selected, but not this code itself.
All descendants of this code are selected, but not this code itself.
This code and any descendants are selected.
All codes from the specified code system.
